backend/main.mo: Actor exposes a test function that returns the caller principal but traps if the caller is anonymous.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence indicators.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Human‑written summaries describing the purpose and functionality of key frontend components and sections.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Asset configuration defining cache rules and content-type headers for frontend files served on the IC.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing global state, authentication, plan selection, demo mode, and section scrolling.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Internet Identity sign-in/sign-out UI with principal display, error handling, and forwarded ref support.
frontend/src/components/DeployDiagnostic: Runtime diagnostics banner that detects and displays IC deployment or configuration issues.
frontend/src/components/PlanStatus.tsx: Badge component showing the user’s current plan (Free or Pro) with corresponding icons.
frontend/src/components/Reveal.tsx: Scroll-triggered animation wrapper using IntersectionObserver with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/canvasE: Generates a birthday card image on a canvas using template backgrounds, overlays, and wrapped text, then downloads it as PNG.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/loadCar: Loads a background image asynchronously and returns it as an HTMLImageElement.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/textWra: Wraps text into lines based on canvas width, limiting output to 12 lines.
frontend/src/features/examples/sampleWis: Provides sample birthday wishes with metadata for names, relationships, tones, and messages.
frontend/src/features/generator/constant: Defines available relationships, tones, languages, and personality options for wish generation.
frontend/src/features/generator/format.t: Formats a BirthdayPack object into a styled text block with sections for each component.
frontend/src/features/generator/generate: Builds a full birthday wish pack using form data and language phrases, generating multiple text outputs.
frontend/src/features/generator/language: Returns language-specific phrase sets for generating birthday messages in English, Hindi, or Hinglish.
frontend/src/features/generator/randomiz: Randomly generates form data values for the birthday generator using predefined option lists.
frontend/src/features/generator/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for relationships, tones, languages, personalities, form data, birthday packs, and template IDs.
frontend/src/features/templates/applyTem: Maps template IDs to Tailwind class strings for styling preview cards.
frontend/src/features/templates/backgrou: Stores paths to template background images and provides a lookup helper.
frontend/src/features/templates/template: Defines all card templates with IDs, names, icons, background assets, and canvas styling settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing AuthClient creation, login flow, stored identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: A React hook using IntersectionObserver to track element visibility with optional threshold and one-time trigger.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanSelection.ts: Manages per‑principal plan selection stored in localStorage and resets when no principal is present.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced‑motion preference using a media query and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useWhoAmI.ts: Queries the backend for the authenticated caller’s principal, returning null for anonymous users.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining theme variables, base styles, neon utilities, gradients, animations, and accessibility motion rules.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Utility to copy text to the clipboard with a fallback for unsupported browsers.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Shortens principal strings for UI display by keeping a prefix and suffix with ellipsis.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp share URL with encoded text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/sections/ExamplesSection.ts: Displays filterable example wishes using cards and animations within a themed section.
frontend/src/sections/FaqSection.tsx: Renders an FAQ list with accordion items and reveal animation.
frontend/src/sections/FooterSection.tsx: Footer with app info, links, and a branded credit section including dynamic year.
frontend/src/sections/GeneratorSection.t: UI section handling form inputs and generating, randomizing, copying, and sharing birthday wish packs.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Landing hero with branding, authentication prompts, and actions to start generating or try the demo.
frontend/src/sections/LegalSections.tsx: Renders Privacy Policy and Terms of Service content using static text blocks.
frontend/src/sections/OutputSection.tsx: Displays generated birthday outputs with options to copy, share, or download card images.
frontend/src/sections/PricingSection.tsx: Shows available plans and lets users select between Free and upcoming Pro tiers.
frontend/src/sections/TemplatesSection.t: Template selector for birthday card designs with a live preview of the selected template and wish.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, radii, shadows, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite setup for React with env variable prefixes, path aliasing, dev server proxy, and optimized build settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current app goals, architecture notes, issues, and implemented features for WishMint AI.
